title: Uganda: End Police Obstruction of Gatherings (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) Anti-riot police fire canisters of colored teargas to disperse supporters of opposition Forum for Democratic Change during a procession to welcome their leader Kizza Besigye in Kampala on May 12, 2011 . Â©
